title: Minecraft故事模式将在PAX Prime展出试玩

replies.author: 广药
replies.txt_content:
标题: Minecraft故事模式将在PAX Prime展出试玩 本帖最后由 WuGuangYao2012 于 2015-8-28 17:05 编辑 
Heading out to #PAXPrime this week? Be among the very first to play '@Minecraft: Story Mode'!
这个星期出发去PAX Prime了吗？成为首先玩 故事模式 的人！
https://www.telltalegames.com/blog/discussion/99459/play-the-minecraft-story-mode-beta-at-pax-prime




在PAX Prime试玩minecraft story mode beta



Team Telltale is about to head off to PAX Prime in Seattle... where we'll be giving you the opportunity to experience the very first public, playable, hands-on beta of Minecraft: Story Mode! This is the first time anyone outside of Telltale and Mojang will get to play part of the season premiere, and the first time we're showing the game outside of the initial trailer that debuted at Minecon several weeks back. If you're at the show, don't miss out on seeing the stuff we've been keeping under wraps!
Telltale团队去西雅图的 PAX Prime了...
到时我们会给你机亲自体验首次公开的Minecraft 故事模式测试版！
这是除了Telltale和Mojang以外的任何人第一次展示的一部分，
我们在Minecon时展示过了游戏最初的预告，
如果你在会上，不要错过！我们一直保持保密的！

故事模式将于西雅图时间8.29 20:30 北京时间8.30 11:30
在PAX Prime游戏展进行更多介绍和试玩。
届时twitch将全程直播，有兴趣的可以看下。
